Canvas: 1440px Ã— 460px hero

CIRCLE SIZES (Golden Ratio):

- Tertiary: 152px (0.38x) - image

POSITIONS:
- Primary: x=200, y=50

RESULT: Circles read as unified cluster, diagonal cascade creates movement, text emerges from composition.
